effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

short_effect.black-white: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.black-white: The user drains the target’s blood. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user drains the target’s blood. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
